# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width = 10)
    lines = String[]
    current_line_length = 0

    for word in split(text)
        if current_line_length + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, "")
            current_line_length = 0
        end

        current_line_length += length(word) + 1 # Add one for space between words
    end

    if current_line_length > 0
        push!(lines, word)
    end

    return join(lines)
end
```

Example usage:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("Hello world! This is a very long sentence that needs to be wrapped.")
"Hello world!\nThis is a very long sentence that needs to be wrapped."
```
